We stress on following Lean Startup & Agile Project Management methodologies. These combined with continuous deliveries & deployment allow us to shorten product go-live date. Also enable us to have a scalable architecture, keeping project costs & delays at least.
We always have long-term relations with our clients across the product or startup life-cycle. The average relationship age is 2.5 years & longest being 8 years.
Most of the projects start with initial product development for an MVP or Beta Launch. This leads to continuous development and enhancement of the product in a growth stage. Later in the scaling stage, our role is to maintain and support the live application.
